member.name: T:karel.VB.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:karel.VB.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:karel.VB.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:karel.VB.StringHelper.StringOfCharacter(System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return a string of fised length filled with one single character.
member.remarks: If you call for example StringOfCharacter("0",4) returned value will be "0000".

member.name: M:karel.VB.StringHelper.Substring(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns portion of specified string. Always returns string value even if index and length are out of bounds or input text is Nothing
member.param: zero-based position of your substring's first character

member.name: M:karel.VB.StringHelper.FixedLength(System.String,System.Int32,karel.VB.StringHelper.StringAlignment,System.Char)
member.summary: Returns string of defined length. Longer string is truncated, shorter string is added leading or trailing characters depending on defined Alignment.
member.param: String that you want to process.
Length you want the string to be formatted to
If Left, trailing characters are put to the end of the string. If Right, leading characters are put to beginning of the string.
Character to fill remaining space with.

member.name: M:karel.VB.StringHelper.FixedLengthNumber(System.Object,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns string of fixed length containing number prefixed with zeros to fit desired size. Decimal separators are removed.
